page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Main employers in the area are the nuclear power station at Hinkley Point and Bridgwter Cellophane, which is a subsiduary of the giant Courtald group of industries. Other factories include the Quantock Preserving Company and Leffman's, both employing mostly women. There are a large number of professional people in this area e.g. government officers,teachers, doctors, dentists and bankers. Many of the town's smaller light industries have either closed or moved from the area due to the recession of the last few years. Young people, especially, are finding it difficult to get employment when they leave school.
